1565107716_152fY68b7kM9nj4ErMRzbP64dVtj2.body: Be direct. But not too direct. Explain things thoroughly. But don't overdo it. Make sure she thinks you're trying. But don't try too hard. If you do all this correctly then you will only have a restraining order and not sexual assault charges. It's a bit tricky to get right.

1564963792_17i73awrYG3UfPMGBeDo3J4XuadYw.body: People who go barefoot in the city are subhuman. Sandals are pushing it, and I think similarly of shorts unless the climate is hot. Barefoot at home is ok as long as you keep your place clean and have no guests over.
